revision.comment: remove final dot from non-English {{surname|pt}} line
revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|en|ja|山田|tr=Yamada}}. ===Proper noun=== {{en-proper noun|Yamadas}} # {{surname|en|from=Japanese}}. ====Statistics==== * According to the 2010 United States Census, ''Yamada'' is the 7,461<sup>th</sup> most common surname in the United States, belonging to 4,467 individuals. ''Yamada'' is most common among Asian/Pacific Islander (78.80%) individuals. ===Further reading=== * {{R:en:DAFN}} ---- ==French== ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|fr|ja|山田|tr=Yamada}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{fr-IPA}} ===Proper noun=== {{fr-proper noun}} # {{surname|fr|from=Japanese}} ---- ==Japanese== ===Romanization=== {{ja-romaji}} # {{ja-romanization of|やまだ}} ---- ==Portuguese== ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|pt|ja|山田|tr=Yamada}}. ===Proper noun=== {{pt-proper noun|m|g2=f}} # {{surname|pt|from=Japanese}}
